adrFormatAddress: 538 W 48th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

editorialSummary.text: Modern accommodations with a 24-hour fitness center, plus free Wi-Fi & hot breakfast.

originalText.text:
Touria at the front desk was especially delightful. This place really deserves a higher rating of 3.8 overall. You can tell the staff really cares about guest experience and work hard to make sure you have a good stay.

Reasons for 5 star rating:
1) Very clean and smelled good. Property overall needed some updating but I’d take clean and well-maintained over dirty any day.
2) Amazing staff, friendly — makes you forget you’re in New York
3) decent breakfast included.
4) stayed 3 nights and they did a turn down each day, fixed beds, emptied trash, replenished towels, etc.
5) comfy beds, no stains on linens and towels
6) fantastic location in the heart of Hell’s Kitchen and walking distance to all the tourist attractions.
7) Value! At $80 - $100/ night in a prime location of NYC… if you give this place less than 5 stars then you probably woke up with some dirty New York rats in your hotel room lolol

originalText.text: The rooms were clean and beautiful. They allowed us to check in early. They also allowed us to put our luggage in a private room. They also gave me a better room because their room was empty. Breakfasts were very good. You can eat a lot. The only problem was it was a little far from the centre.

text.text: The rooms were clean and beautiful. They allowed us to check in early. They also allowed us to put our luggage in a private room. They also gave me a better room because their room was empty. Breakfasts were very good. You can eat a lot. The only problem was it was a little far from the centre.

originalText.text: So easy to check in and super friendly staff. We had no issues and they held our suitcases until we had to leave for the airport our last day. Great safe area, good views from our room and such a clean room.

text.text: So easy to check in and super friendly staff. We had no issues and they held our suitcases until we had to leave for the airport our last day. Great safe area, good views from our room and such a clean room.

originalText.text: Everything as expected. Not a long check in process. Professional desk service. $50 deposit. The room looked exactly like the pictures. Dove products in the bathroom. I didn’t get up in time for breakfast. But the coffee was good. A bit far from shops. I bought my food in another neighborhood. Housekeeping tried to get into my room early. But overall nice stay.

text.text: Everything as expected. Not a long check in process. Professional desk service. $50 deposit. The room looked exactly like the pictures. Dove products in the bathroom. I didn’t get up in time for breakfast. But the coffee was good. A bit far from shops. I bought my food in another neighborhood. Housekeeping tried to get into my room early. But overall nice stay.

originalText.text: I was pleasantly surprised with my one night stay at the Holiday Inn Express Manhattan Midtown West Hotel. I reserved a guest room with one queen bed as the location is ideal to the Salsa Socials I attend on Sunday nights close to the hotel. The hotel is immaculate, great front desk staff and quick response to any technical issues you may have with a guest room. The room is not roomy, but is was really great as a no frills place just to rest my head for a night. My room on the 11th floor even had a view of the city and partial view of the Hudson River.  They have a great first floor area for sitting and they have a really great full service self serve breakfast in the mornings. Breakfast is included as part of your stay!! Breakfast was great and the place was buzzing with guests speaking in many different languages. I stuffed my face at breakfast!! Bring a magnifying mirror if you need to do makeup and the closet space is not that roomy but serves the purpose for the night. The room has a small refrigerator  and coffee maker and coffee and tea bags. At night there is a snack area on the first floor in case you get the munchies where you can buy chips, ice cream and snacks.  I paid $117.00 which is a steal in NYC. They will add a $50.00 deposit upon checking in which will be refunded to you down the road. It's within walking distance to the Intrepid Air and Space museum and the west side waterfront.  It's relatively close to the 42 Street area, within walking distance. The bathroom hair and face wash products are DOVE brand which is great. I will be using this hotel when I go to my Sunday night salsa socials then crash at my guest room. Great deal!!
